description:
Breathtaking ‘Bundaleer’, nestled among the gum trees just moments from the beach and river, epitomises relaxed and stylish modern living. Innovative design unites with exceptional craftsmanship, a rich textural palette and premium finishes resulting in an enduring sense of luxury and warmth for unparalleled coastal living. Upon first sight, you’ll be awed by striking hardwood shingles covering the exterior of the home, that merge spectacularly with eye-catching angles and feature glazing all set against relaxed native surrounds. Inside, earthy tones and timber accents complement curved lines and playful roof pitches, delighting the eye at every turn.

Zoned living flows seamlessly throughout the home, tied together by the central kitchen living and dining space overlooking the pool and lush surrounds. The kitchen delights with bespoke Corian benchtops and timber veneer cabinetry, while the luxe island bar is the perfect place to mix an evening cocktail. The eastern wing features the master bedroom, walk-in-robe with central display island and a breathtaking ensuite to make even the most mundane aspects of daily living a dream. The contemporary home office boasts flawless timber cabinetry and porta contoured walls that remain a continuing feature throughout the home. The west wing includes three expertly appointed bedrooms with window nooks overlooking the pool and native gardens, while the opulent family bathroom is truly exquisite.

The interiors flow seamlessly outdoors, where entertainers will be thrilled by the expertly appointed undercover entertaining space overlooking the stunning magnesium salt pool and spa. Beautiful memories are sure to be made hosting poolside barbeques before sharing stories under the stars in the backyard firepit. A spacious four-car garage ensures ample space for storage of cars, caravans and the like, while ducted heating/cooling and hydronic slab heating ensure climate control year-round. State-of-the-art technology is a hallmark of this exceptional home, including a ‘Control4’ smart operating system, 8 zone speaker set up, wifi-controlled irrigation, three camera security system and a 20kw solar array with two batteries for sustainable living.

Set back from the road on 2479 sqm (approx..) in the leafy Yellowgums estate, a soundtrack of birdsong is your constant companion at Bundaleer. Enjoy walks in the nearby Nature Reserve or venture a little further to explore local beaches, the Barwon river or Ocean Grove and Barwon Heads town centres. This is a truly remarkable opportunity for unrivalled seaside living with exceptional style in one of the most sought-after pockets of the Bellarine.

- Innovative design and exceptional craftsmanship
- Dual living zones, luxurious wet areas and spacious bedrooms
- Exquisite outdoor entertaining and magnesium salt pool/spa
- State-of-the-art smart technology and solar system
- Premium earthy finishes and top-of-the-range appliances
- Four car garage, spacious allotment and leafy surrounds
